column5: I just got quoted a good price on an Apollo Stainless prop for my Yamaha F90. Just curious if anyone has one?
I think that's a Michigan Wheel  products and I have owner a few from them, they worked well and were much cheaper priced  then many other SS props
Hey Dax just wondering since we are running the same Yammy what are the pro`s and con`s of SS versus the stock prop?  Thanks

I have always been in favour of Alum. over SS for the usual reasons, I fish and frequent shallow water alot. A friend who has a bigger boat and an Yamaha F150 recently stated that his boat felt gutless with an Alum. prop the one time he put one on...Got me wondering what my boat would be like with a SS prop!?

I put a stainless prop on when I bought my new motor (Johnson 70 2-stroke) for my old boat and I was instantly impressed, so impressed that I bought the prop.  Certainly makes you more careful though, 8 seasons so far and not a ding.
